 */export var UPDATE_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCTS='UPDATE_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCTS';export var ADD_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCT='ADD_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCT';/**
 * Add RecentlyViewed product into list.
 * @param  {Object} product Product returned from fetch
 * @param  {String} store code
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/RecentlyViewedProducts/Action/addRecentlyViewedProduct
 */export var addRecentlyViewedProduct=middleware(function(product,store){return{type:ADD_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCT,product:product,store:store};},"Store/RecentlyViewedProducts/Action/addRecentlyViewedProduct\n");/**
 * Update RecentlyViewed products list.
 * @param  {Object} product Product returned from fetch
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/RecentlyViewedProducts/Action/updateRecentlyViewedProducts
 */export var updateRecentlyViewedProducts=middleware(function(products,storeCode){return{type:UPDATE_RECENTLY_VIEWED_PRODUCTS,products:products,storeCode:storeCode};},"Store/RecentlyViewedProducts/Action/updateRecentlyViewedProducts\n");
